style: font-size: 40px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 17.61%;top: 2.73%;width: 26.06%;height: 1.17%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
日は
沈んでるかな?
…人の声も
聞こえないけど
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.59%;top: 17.14%;width: 32.98%;height: 2.83%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.10%;top: 17.00%;width: 13.09%;height: 0.69%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;transform: rotate(-23deg);font-weight: bold;

text:
今日のお仕事
サボっちゃった
かな…
style: font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.33%;top: 17.59%;width: 20.53%;height: 1.91%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.18%;top: 33.59%;width: 21.49%;height: 1.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 45px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 64.41%;top: 34.21%;width: 22.13%;height: 3.15%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.29%;top: 39.77%;width: 26.60%;height: 0.99%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: bold;

text:
別に
あなたの
心配なんて
してないわよ
style: font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.46%;top: 40.20%;width: 20.96%;height: 2.31%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 25px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.35%;top: 46.34%;width: 13.51%;height: 1.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ほら、受け取って。
なんで杖を持たずに
木の枝で森を歩き
回るの!
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.63%;top: 49.40%;width: 29.15%;height: 2.33%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.71%;top: 50.66%;width: 9.68%;height: 1.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
なんで
戻ってくるなり
叩くの!
アリアのこと
一日中心配
したんだよ!
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.67%;top: 49.67%;width: 27.87%;height: 3.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
無事に
帰って
来てくれて
嬉しいわ!
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 60.16%;top: 60.69%;width: 23.19%;height: 2.32%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 56.22%;top: 63.79%;width: 12.02%;height: 1.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 71.76%;top: 63.77%;width: 21.60%;height: 0.68%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 71.33%;top: 64.87%;width: 22.45%;height: 0.47%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
お前は一日中
いなかったが
何人かお前に聞きに
来てるぞ
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.29%;top: 66.24%;width: 35.64%;height: 2.13%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0% 0% 50% 50%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.31%;top: 67.15%;width: 13.09%;height: 1.45%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.31%;top: 67.15%;width: 13.09%;height: 1.45%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.84%;top: 70.12%;width: 19.57%;height: 1.08%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 16.33%;top: 71.34%;width: 13.62%;height: 1.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ところで
一日中どこに
いたんだ?
誰もお前を見かけ
なかったぞ!
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 68.24%;top: 74.13%;width: 28.83%;height: 3.82%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
仕事する
気分じゃ
なかったから
散歩に～
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.46%;top: 78.44%;width: 19.89%;height: 2.00%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
正直に
言えるとは
どんな神経
してんだ!
style: font-size: 20px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.67%;top: 80.51%;width: 15.53%;height: 2.58%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
アハハ…
メンゴ メンゴ～
埋め合わせは
明日するわ!
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 71.44%;top: 78.55%;width: 25.64%;height: 3.91%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
一応聞くが
森へは行って
ないよな?
style: font-size: 40px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.14%;top: 87.56%;width: 34.68%;height: 4.75%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
いいえ!
私が
死にたい
ように
見える?
style: font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 52.39%;top: 94.81%;width: 24.68%;height: 3.84%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
